reviewText: Story fell far short for any "horse person."  There was so much they could have done to improve the story line. Really sad.
Title: Amazing Racer

reviewText: This movie has some of the classic elements of a "horse" movie, but at the same time some substance that makes it a movie of its own.  A young girl finds out after her father dies that she has a Mother.  A real and live one, not one who died in childbirth like her Dad told her.  Naturally, there is shock on both sides.  And while she and her Mother try to make things work at least for a summer trial period, they do still both have adjustments to make.  Enter into the picture her Mother's boyfriend's horse farm and a special horse that only the girl can get to race well.  Unfortunately, there is a rival horse farm with a spy in their midst.  And they pick up the filly in a claims race only to proceed to beat her and mistreat the poor horse.  However, through the eventual rehabilitation of the horse with a trainer named Max, all turns out well.  The movie leaves one feeling refreshed and happy.  Which is a pleasant and rare feeling nowadays.  So I recommend this movie highly.  It only has one mild swear word in it.  So it is suitable for family viewing.
Title: Amazing Racer

reviewText: experience a struggling teen who finds a life through a dramatic horse friendship. the relationship has some life challenges for both and ultimately love conquers.
Title: Amazing Racer

reviewText: Great acting, great story, great cinematography.  Yes, I like family films with positive stories.I watch movies to get a positive reaction and enjoy stories based on true situations.I am over 60 years young and I believe the family is very important.  I believe, if you feel the same, youWill enjoy this movie very much.

reviewText: This movie showed me about the good and bad choices we make and how we treat others. They can have good or bad consequences. The movie showed this in a entertaining way.
Title: Amazing Racer

reviewText: This is an outstanding, heart-warming movie for the whole family and those who love horse racing.  I am, however, wondering why there is NO recognition of JASON GEDRICK, who most definitely had a major role in this movie...and did a fine job, I might add.  He's not mentioned in the star line-up on the front of the DVD, nor in any description of this movie.  I've been a huge fan of Jason Gedrick's since I first saw him in "Dare To Love", so shame on the promoters of Amazing Racer for not recognizing this fine actor.
Title: Amazing Racer
